channel.title: Server nulls
channel.description:
Please could someone help me.
My server keeps getting nulled! Every freaking hour!!
It keeps making my server status page be uptime 99% and it's pissing me off!! Everyone keeps quitting because it's nulled SOOO much! I'm sure this happens to every server but I'm so tired of it! I've set up an auto restarter every 90 minutes but THAT IS NOT ENOUGH! IT GETS NULLED IN BETWEEN THAT TIME!!!
I will be willing to pay for someone to help me fix this! Please!
Here is my status page [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=173.203.64.152]Terms Of Service[/url]
99%!! It's not on page 1 at the very freaking top anymore!! AGHHH!!!
